# css-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Description

A button component that accepts a label as a property.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description      | Type     | Default     |
|----------|-----------|------------------|----------|-------------|
| `label`  | `label`   | The button label | `string` | `undefined` |

## Usage

```html

<css-button label="Click me"></css-button>
```
